init.title: LifeSmart Integration Options
init.description: Select which settings you want to edit for Hub.

main_params.title: General Settings
main_params.description: Configure exclusion lists for devices and hubs.

data.exclude: List of devices to be excluded (comma-separated)
data.exclude_agt: List of hubs to be excluded (comma-separated)
data.ai_include_agt: List of hubs to be included in Scenes (comma-separated)
data.ai_include_me: List of devices to be included in Scenes (comma-separated)

auth_params.title: Authentication Settings
auth_params.description: You can update your authentication method or credentials here. This will trigger a reload of the integration.

auth_password.title: Hub Setup
auth_password.description: Please enter your account password. The password will be stored securely within Home Assistant to refresh the token.

send_ir_keys.name: Send IR Keys
send_ir_keys.description: Sends IR keys to a remote device.

me.name: Device ID
me.description: The 'me' identifier of the device containing the IR blaster.

ai.name: Remote ID
ai.description: The 'ai' identifier of the virtual remote.

category.name: Category
category.description: The category of the target device (e.g., 'tv').

brand.name: Brand
brand.description: The brand of the target device.

keys.name: Keys
keys.description: The command key to be sent (e.g., 'power').

send_ackeys.name: Send A/C Keys
send_ackeys.description: Sends IR keys to an A/C device.

me.name: Device ID
me.description: The 'me' identifier of the device containing the IR blaster.

ai.name: Remote ID
ai.description: The 'ai' identifier of the virtual remote.

category.name: Category
category.description: The category of the target device ('ac').

brand.name: Brand
brand.description: The brand of the target A/C.

keys.name: Keys
keys.description: The command key to be sent.

power.name: Power
power.description: Power state (1 for on, 0 for off).

agt.name: Hub ID
agt.description: The 'agt' identifier of the hub where the scene is defined.

id.name: Scene ID
id.description: The identifier of the scene to trigger.

press_switch.name: Press Switch
press_switch.description: Performs a momentary press on a switch entity (turns on, then off after a duration).

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: The entity_id of the switch entity to press.

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: Duration of the press in milliseconds. Defaults to 1000ms (1 second).
